title: Rearrange Products Table
markdown:
# **Rearrange Products Table**

## Implement the 'Rearrange Products Table' query using UNION ALL.

### Table Schema
| Column | Type |
|--------|------|
| id | INT |
| val | INT |

### Example

**Input:**
```
**t6**
+----+-----+
| id | val |
+----+-----+
| 1  | 10  |
| 2  | 20  |
| 3  | 30  |
+----+-----+
```

**Expected Output:**
```
+----+-----+
| id | val |
+----+-----+
| 1  | 10  |
| 2  | 20  |
| 3  | 30  |
+----+-----+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE t6(id INT, val INT); INSERT INTO t6 VALUES (1,10),(2,20),(3,30);
CREATE TABLE t6(id INT, val INT);
CREATE TABLE t6(id INT, val INT); INSERT INTO t6 VALUES (1,100);
